name: Odd Job
description:
DISCLAIMER: This game is purely a parody and is my first game so you shouldn't take this dumpster fire seriously in the slightest

ODD JOB is a short simplistic crude RPG Maker game about a man named Ivan and his quest to find good pay for his rent fees. Battle foes big and tiny in this action-loosely-packed journey!

  • 4 Distinct Areas
  • 5 Diabolical Bosses
  • Too many attempts at comedy
  • Tons of goofy enemies to thwart
  • And a original soundtrack to relax and battle dudes to!
